short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the top 10 songs on the billboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays the top 10 songs of the month. Also provides you with a direct link to the youtube video of the songs. 

You can view as well as play the songs using the extension.
